title: Calories in 80/20 Ground Beef
meta_description: Learn calories in 80 20 ground beef per 100g, including protein, fat, carbs, and full nutrition facts for easy meal planning.
assumptions: Raw, 80% lean meat / 20% fat ground beef; no added seasonings or fillers.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by brand, fat content accuracy, cooking method, and portion size. Check labels when available.

quick_answer.text: 100g of 80/20 ground beef provides ~254 kcal and ~17g protein.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

tweaks.label: Add 1 tsp oil for cooking per 100g

faqs.q: How many calories in 100g of 80/20 ground beef?
faqs.a: About 254 kcal for raw 80/20 ground beef.

faqs.q: What is the protein in 80 20 ground beef?
Does cooking change calories in 80/20 ground beef?
faqs.a: Yes, cooking like pan-broiling reduces calories to ~174 kcal per 100g due to fat drainage.

faqs.q: How much fat is in 80 20 ground beef?
Is 80/20 ground beef high in cholesterol?
faqs.a: It has 71mg cholesterol per 100g, which is moderate; varies with cooking.
